text: Mônica Morais Dias Riedel (born September 28, 1970) is the current first lady of Mato Grosso do Sul since January 1, 2023, as wife of Eduardo Riedel. Graduated in Business Management by the Fundação Getúlio Vargas, which he completed on December 6, 2020. == References == == Other websites == * Category:First Ladies of Brazil Category:Living people Category:1970 births Category:People from Mato Grosso do Sul
title: Mônica Riedel
